channel.title: News on Leipzig Gophers

item.title: Go makes the frontpage
item.description:
On 22, Jan 2019, Go made it to the frontpage of heise.de, with an introductory article about the language:

  • Einstieg in Go (German)

After a brief historical overview, the authors jump right into various channels types. They also highlight struct embedding and interfaces.
